content: > when i was in vienna in december 2004 i saw hats like these being sold in the christmas markets i kept thinking how great a hat like this would look in noro kureyon which i had in my stash at home i couldn t find a pattern to make one so i designed this one > > i used noro kureyon nr 92 and 4 5mm needles if i recall correctly it took a little more than one ball gauge 4 5 spi uses a little more than one skein of noro kureyon
